parameters.pt:
1 if the applicant indicated an interest in
Political Theory; 0 otherwise
parameters.gre.quant:
applicant's score on the quantitative
section of the GRE; the maximum score is 800
parameters.gre.verbal:
applicant's score on the verbal section of
the GRE; the maximum score is 800
parameters.ap:
1 if the applicant indicated an interest in
American politics; 0 otherwise

title: Applications to a Political Science PhD Program
description:
Description
Ordinal ratings (faculty evaluations) of applicants to a Political Science PhD
Program.
format: A data frame with 106 observations on the following 6 variables.
